lead_paragraph: Tools that study posts to Twitter and blogs, known as sentiment analysis, can quickly determine the messages most resonating with voters.
snippet: Tools that study posts to Twitter and blogs, known as sentiment analysis, can quickly determine the messages most resonating with voters.

headline.main: Nation’s Political Pulse, Taken Using Net Chatter
headline.seo: Sentiment Analysis Comes to the 2010 Campaign
headline.print_headline: Nation’s Political Pulse, Taken Using Net Chatter
